com.suse.saltstack.netapi.client

Interface ConnectionFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HttpClientConnectionFactory, JDKConnectionFactory

    public interface ConnectionFactory
    Describes an interface for creating instances of an HTTP connection implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> Connection<T> create(String endpoint, JsonParser<T> parser, ClientConfig config)
      Create a new Connection for a given endpoint and configuration.
